project.title: Smart Garden
project.subtitle: Set up remote monitoring and controll of your garden or small agricultural production. Our product offers immediate control and long term analysis for improving your outputs.

control.title: Monitoring and control in real time
control.text: A network of sensors and controllers uses the internet to allow constant contact with your field. Follow what is going on using your smart phone.

upload.title: Storage of data for analysis and planning
upload.text: Every measurement and every command is recorded and stored in the cloud for later review and scientific analysis.

visualisation.title: Data visualisation
visualisation.text: Using the latest open source solutions like grafana and prometheus we can visualise the recorded data in a wide variety of charts and graphs.

security.title: Security and privacy
security.text: Your data and command interface is protected from malicious actors using industry standard encryption and authentication.

system.title: About the smart garden system
system.subtitle: The system consists of two subsystems - the local sensor cluster orcharstrated by a single board computer and the remote cloud that collects data and relays commands.
system.first: When you buy our produc we install sensors into your field or garden along with a single board computer that controlls them. This machine is usually a Raspberry Pi computer. The SBC connects locally with the sensors using Zigbee hubs. It opens a remote tunnel via internet with the controll server in the cloud.

remote.title: Remote controll i and storage
remote.text: The linked local controller uses the remote server to allow for remote controll and monitoring while storing all collected data and actions in a safe place.

encryption.title: Encryption and authentication
encryption.text: Access to your data and controll interace is allowed only to authorized personnel. All changes made are linked to the user account that initiated them.

longterm.title: Long term analysis and insights
longterm.text: All measured sensor values and actions taken are recorded into a data base in the cloud. The data are available to you at any moment and you can easily forward them to an export you have authorized to analyze them.

system.second: The Zigbee wireless protocol allows communication between the sensor and the local controller at a low rate of energy consumption. This means that a senzor can operate for months using a small battery.
system.heading: Manage your garden or field in a simple, easy way
system.third: By installing our smart garden system you will reduce the need for constant inspection of your garden, nursery or field. Electronic sensors will monitor your plants and notify about problems that require your immediate attention.
